name: Dinari RIOT
description: The Dinari dShare token for Riot Platforms (Dinari RIOT) is a 1:1 backed token representing shares of RIOT. RIOT.d allows users to gain exposure to Riot Platforms's equity in a tokenized form, leveraging the benefits of blockchain technology. Each RIOT.d token is fully backed by a corresponding number of Riot Platforms shares, securely held in a transparent treasury vault. This tokenized version of RIOT shares offers enchanced transferability, instant settlement, 247 trading, and fractional ownersop making it more accessible and liquid for a wider range of investors.
